requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Quad-Core 2+ Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT 400 / Radeon 6000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 720p24 cinematic, human eye can't see more than 24 FPS anyways. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 and so on
  • Processor: Doesn't really matter, it'll run like crap on anything
  • Memory: 666 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Whatever, just don't forget to bring eggs to cook on it
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 666 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional, tbh you'd rather not hear it
  • Additional Notes: 1080p30 silky smooth if lucky, good luck! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
